Summary: As a user, I want to enter phone number, so that an OTP could be sent for verification.
As a user, I must enter OTP, so that I can log into EoW Website for selling an old product
As a user, I must enter a title for my ad
As a user, I must enter the category of my product
As a user, I must enter Price quoted for my product
As a user, I must enter product description like brand,h/w,s/w specs
As a user, I must enter Upload atleast a photo of product.
As a user, I must enter my name
As a user, I must enter my phone number, so that interested buyers can contact me,
As a user, I must enter the city I live in.
As a user, I must enter the locality of my residence
As a user, I must submit all details of my product so that my product gets validated by the site.
As a user, I must enter the verification code, so that I can complete posting the ad
